channel.title: Licton Springs Community Council - Street Improvements

item.title: Outlines Provide Sneak Peak of Street Improvements
item.description: A friend of the blog dropped a hint letting us know that a new traffic circle has been outlined for N 97th and Wallingford Ave N, which SDOT plans on having completed this summer! The circle will be a very welcome addition to the area, as, despite lots of warning â€¦
item.dc:creator: timothycrosley
